about_the_game:
The soundtrack to The Little Black Bestiary: The Salted Cookies of Carthaginia.

Sounds like an afternoon of chilling on the couch with an undead lich queen and watching weird TV shows.
Cozy, slightly spooky beats.

Technically hip-hop, but we're really bad at keeping within well-defined genre constraints.
Contains a little over 20 minutes of music.
